scripts.clean:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild clean -project RNIFKTest.xcodeproj -configuration Debug -scheme RNIFKTest -derivedDataPath build
scripts.infer:ios: cd ios && infer --fail-on-issue -- xcodebuild -project RNIFKTest.xcodeproj -configuration Debug -scheme RNIFKTest -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,id=E12D5ABF-4501-4EF3-B8B0-D0BBA1FDD765,OS=12.1,name=iPhone 7' -derivedDataPath build
